monsterfeatures.name: Agressivitat
monsterfeatures.effect: Com a acció bonus, the creature can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature it can see.

monsterfeatures.name: Emboscar
monsterfeatures.effect: The creature has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it has surprised.

monsterfeatures.name: Armes Angelicals
monsterfeatures.Els atacs armats de effect: The creature's són màgics. When the creature hits with any weapon, the weapon deals extra radiant damage. Input this extra damage per round.

monsterfeatures.name: Avoidance
monsterfeatures.effect: If the creature is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to only take half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

monsterfeatures.name: Frenesí de Sang
monsterfeatures.effect: The creature té avantatge a impactar a cos a cos contra tota criatura que no tingui tots els seus punts de vida.

monsterfeatures.name: Constrènyer
monsterfeatures.effect: The creature has the ability to restrain and/or grapple a target as part of an attack.

monsterfeatures.name: Damage Transfer
monsterfeatures.effect: While attached or grappling a creature, the creature takes only half damage dealt to it (arrodoneix a la baixa), and the other creature takes the other half.

monsterfeatures.name: Enlarge
monsterfeatures.effect: The creature magically increases in size, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. Input the extra damage inflicted per round whilst enlarged.

monsterfeatures.name: Presència Aterradora
monsterfeatures.effect: Each creature of the creature's choice within range ha de salvar per Saviesa or be frightened durant 1 minut.

monsterfeatures.name: Escalfor Corporal
monsterfeatures.effect: Touching or hitting the creature while within 5 ft. of it causes damage.

monsterfeatures.name: Albir Terrorífic
monsterfeatures.effect: Each non-undead creature of the creature's choice within range ha de salvar per Saviesa or be frightened durant 1 minut.

monsterfeatures.name: Resistència Llegendària
monsterfeatures.effect: Si the creature falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la. Input the number of uses per day.

monsterfeatures.name: Resistència a la Màgia
monsterfeatures.effect: The creature té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

monsterfeatures.name: Avantatge Marcial
monsterfeatures.effect: The creature can deal extra damage to a creature it hits if that creature is with in 5 ft. of an ally of the creature that isn't incapacitated. Input the extra damage inflicted per round.

monsterfeatures.name: Fugida Veloç
monsterfeatures.effect: The creature can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

monsterfeatures.name: Estratègies de Manada
monsterfeatures.effect: The creature has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the creature's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.

monsterfeatures.name: Parada
monsterfeatures.effect: The creature adds its proficiency bonus to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it as a reaction.

monsterfeatures.name: Posseïr
monsterfeatures.effect: The creature can control another creature, during which time it cannot be targeted by nearly any effect.

monsterfeatures.name: Regeneració
monsterfeatures.effect: At the beginning of the creature's turn, it regains hit points and cannot be killed until this effect is mitigated in some way, usually through acid or fire damage. Input how many hit points it regains at the beginning of its turn.

monsterfeatures.name: Relentless
monsterfeatures.effect: If the creature would be reduced to 0 hit points, there is a chance that it can instead only be reduced to 1.

monsterfeatures.name: Sigil de l'Ombra
monsterfeatures.effect: Quan és dins de llum tènua o de foscor the creature can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

monsterfeatures.name: Ferum
monsterfeatures.effect: Any creature other than the monster within 5 feet of it must make a saving throw or be poisoned.

monsterfeatures.name: Superior Invisibility
monsterfeatures.effect: The creature can turn invisible as an action or bonus action.

monsterfeatures.name: Resiliència No-morta
monsterfeatures.effect: If the creature would be reduced to 0 hit points, there is a chance that it can instead only be reduced to 1. This feature is negated if the damage is from radiant nature.

monsterfeatures.name: Tirarany
monsterfeatures.effect: Atac armat a distància that restrains the target on a hit.
